https://soundcloud.com/eslashe/break
Did this one a while ago, inspired by some of my friend's music, blended with Strings and retro-inspired sounds to create an interesting premium flavor. Best served hot.

item.title: Break - E/E (James Lucien) [Drums & Bass]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Cool, I dig it! I really hope we’re getting more drum and bass style drums soon, specifically, something amen break-ish in sound.

I would have liked if in the middle somewhere you dropped out some of the synths to have maybe just the chiptuney bits and some drums in there, for maybe a few measures, then bring it all back - but that’s just personal preference. Good deal and good to continue to hear people doing dnb.

Read full topic
